content:
@simulacrum Just FYI, I’ve been working on enhancing the "url generation" part of triagebot, so I could fix a small bug which wrongly encoded . in topics, and also adapt the code to allow generating links to user PMs.

Also, I wanted to have a Zulip command that sent back the link to the current channel. I’m working on implementing it.
Thanks for letting me know. Sounds great!
